text: (eṉiṉum avarkaḷiṉ uṭaṉpaṭikkaiyaiyum) evvāṟu (nampa muṭiyum)? Avarkaḷ uṅkaḷai veṟṟi koṇṭālō (nīṅkaḷ avarkaḷukku) uṟaviṉarkaḷ eṉpataiyum (uṅkaḷukkum avarkaḷukkum iṭaiyiluḷḷa) uṭaṉpaṭikkaiyaiyum poruṭpaṭuttuvatēyillai. Taṅkaḷ vārttaikaḷaik koṇṭu (maṭṭum) uṅkaḷait tiruptipaṭuttukiṉṟaṉar; āṉāl, avarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷō (uṅkaḷiṭamiruntu) vilakik koḷkiṉṟaṉa. Avarkaḷil perumpālāṉavarkaḷ pāvikaḷē āvar
